properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
1. MUTINY ABOARD 16.8 METER F/V FATIMA II, WHITE HULL
   WITH BLUE STRIPES, VICINITY 33-10N 17-05E AT
   132030Z JUL. CAPTAIN KILLED AND THROWN OVERBOARD.
   VESSELS IN    VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
   A SHARP LOOKOUT. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
   INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
   PHONE: 39 06 5908 4527, 39 06 5908 4409,
   FAX: 39 06 592 2737, 39 06 5908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT,
   UFFICIO3.REPARTO3@MIT.GOV.IT,
   CGCP3REP4@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1577/12.
